body: No problem! The role of the packages and the changes in v6 weren't always real clear ([see for example](http://stackoverflow.com/q/32544685/1034448)) or documented great (and I've seen the `babel@6` dep in other projects). It was decided to move the CLI from `babel` to `babel-cli` for v6 and we talked about having `babel` be the API and eliminating `babel-core`. That would've been a nice situation to end up with (`babel` = API, `babel-cli` = CLI), but there was concern about the confusion factor. So ultimately `babel` just got deprecated. See also https://babeljs.io/blog/2015/10/31/setting-up-babel-6.
